Package fr.formiko.kokcinelo.model

Class Creature

java.lang.Object
fr.formiko.kokcinelo.model.MapItem
fr.formiko.kokcinelo.model.Creature
Direct Known Subclasses:
Ant, Aphid, Ladybug
public abstract class Creature extends MapItem
Abstact class that represent Creature on the map. Creature can move, fly, hit, eat, died.
Since:
0.1
Version:
0.1

      public void moveFront(float percentOfSpeed)

    • runAwayFrom

      public void runAwayFrom(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 v)
      Set wanted rotation to run away from v. To run away from we calculate angle to go to, then add 180 degre to go to the oposite direction.
      Parameters:
      v - contains coordinate of Point to run away from
